text: Ara niscaya kitabidera madhye emana loka'o ache yara allah‌ra prati binayabanata haye tamra prati ebam tini ya tomadera o tadera prati nayila karechena tate imana ane. Tara allah‌ra ayata tuccha mulye bikri kare na. Tara'i, yadera jan'ya allah‌ra kache puraskara rayeche. Niscaya'i allaha druta hisaba grahanakari
